mapper.insert:
insert into inpt_nurse_third (id,hosp_code, visit_id, baby_id, record_time, in_num, temperature_code, temperature, temperature_retest, pulse, heart_rate, is_ventilator, breath, forty_up_code, forty_up_remark, thirty_five_down_code, thirty_five_down_remark, intake, output, other_output, skin_code, remark, excrement_code, pee_code, height, weight, am_bp, pm_bp, is_operation, operation_days, operation_cnt, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, drug_allergy) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode}, #{item.visitId}, #{item.babyId}, #{item.recordTime}, #{item.inNum}, #{item.temperatureCode}, #{item.temperature}, #{item.temperatureRetest}, #{item.pulse}, #{item.heartRate}, #{item.isVentilator}, #{item.breath}, #{item.fortyUpCode}, #{item.fortyUpRemark}, #{item.thirtyFiveDownCode}, #{item.thirtyFiveDownRemark}, #{item.intake}, #{item.output}, #{item.otherOutput}, #{item.skinCode}, #{item.remark}, #{item.excrementCode}, #{item.peeCode}, #{item.height}, #{item.weight}, #{item.amBp}, #{item.pmBp}, #{item.isOperation}, #{item.operationDays}, #{item.operationCnt}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, #{item.crteTime}, #{item.drugAllergy})
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(record_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as record_time from inpt_nurse_third where forty_up_code = '4'
and visit_id = #{visitId} and hosp_code= #{hospCode} ORDER BY record_time
